description: This file defines the interface IEventHandler within the WPEFramework plugin namespace. It declares several pure virtual methods for handling container-related events, such as start, stop, failure, and state change, each accepting a JSON object as data.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface for handling container events, requiring implementation of methods to respond to container lifecycle changes.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Handles the event when a container has started.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Handles the event when a container has stopped.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Handles the event when a container has failed.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Handles changes to the container's state.
